channel.title: CVE Feed for erudika -- erudika/scoold
channel.description: The latest CVEs for erudika -- erudika/scoold

item.title: CVE-2022-1543|2024-08-03T00:10:03.981Z -- erudika -- erudika%2Fscoold
item.description: Improper handling of Length parameter in GitHub repository erudika/scoold prior to 1.49.4. When the text size is large enough the service results in a momentary outage in a production environment. That can lead to memory corruption on the server.
